## Larvae and YOY indicators

### Recruitment
```{r, recruit}
test <- stock %>%
  dplyr::filter(Metric == "Recruitment") %>%
  dplyr::rename(
    Var = Metric,
    Val = Value
  )
if (nrow(test) > params$lag) {
  NEesp::render_indicator(test, lab = names[1])
} else {
  names <- names[-1]
  print("No data")
}
```
